messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/26/2002 3:24:33 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Mary, I got it from a quote on the Unschooling.com boards. It could be yours!  Take
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/26/2002 3:24:33 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
zenmomma@... writes:


> Dena, this is my favorite unschooling quote! I even have it printed out and
> pinned up next to my computer so I'll be sure to see it everyday. :o)

Mary,
I got it from a quote on the Unschooling.com boards. It could be yours! <
bg>

Take care,
Dena
"If nobody makes you do it, it counts as fun."
~Hobbes~





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Favorite quote
messages.msgSnippet: ... ~Hobbes~ Dena, this is my favorite unschooling quote! I even have it printed out and pinned up next to my computer so I ll be sure to see it everyday.
messages.messageBody:
>>"If nobody makes you do it, it counts as fun."
~Hobbes~>>

Dena, this is my favorite unschooling quote! I even have it printed out and
pinned up next to my computer so I'll be sure to see it everyday. :o)

Life is good.
~Mary
